android.car

类 CarBugreportManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.CarBugreportManager

  • public final class CarBugreportManager
extends CarManagerBase
    Car specific bugreport manager. Only available for userdebug and eng builds.

    • 嵌套类概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • requestBugreport

        public void requestBugreport(ParcelFileDescriptor output,
                             ParcelFileDescriptor extraOutput,
                             CarBugreportManager.CarBugreportManagerCallback callback)
        Request a bug report. A zipped (i.e. legacy) bugreport is generated in the background using dumpstate. This API also generates extra files that do not exist in the legacy bugreport and makes them available through an extra output file. Currently the extra output contains the screenshots for all the physical displays.

        It closes provided file descriptors. The callback runs on a background thread.

        This method is enabled only for one bug reporting app. It can be configured using config_car_bugreport_application string that is defined in packages/services/Car/service/res/values/config.xml. To learn more please see packages/services/Car/tests/BugReportApp/README.md.

        参数:
        output - the zipped bugreport file.
        extraOutput - a zip file that contains extra files generated for automotive.
        callback - the callback for reporting dump status.

      • requestBugreportForTesting

        public void requestBugreportForTesting(ParcelFileDescriptor output,
                                       ParcelFileDescriptor extraOutput,
                                       CarBugreportManager.CarBugreportManagerCallback callback)
        Similar to requestBugreport() above, but runs with dumpstateDryRun=true.

      • cancelBugreport

        public void cancelBugreport()
        Cancels the running bugreport. It doesn't guarantee immediate cancellation and after calling this method, callbacks provided in requestBugreport(ParcelFileDescriptor, ParcelFileDescriptor, android.car.CarBugreportManager.CarBugreportManagerCallback) might still get fired. The next startBugreport should be called after a delay to allow the system to fully complete the cancellation.

      • onCarDisconnected

        public void onCarDisconnected()
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase
